sound

Class SoundManager.SoundPlayerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • sound.SoundManager.SoundPlayerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    SoundManager

    public static class SoundManager.SoundPlayerThread
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This is the Thread that lets the music play. The only thing that can be Observed from this class is the destruction of this class.
    Since:
    10-8-2014
    Version:
    10-8-2014
    Author:
    stefanboodt
    See Also:
    Thread, SoundManager.Sound, FilteredSoundStream

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DESTROYED
      Indicates the destruction of the player.
      static java.lang.String PAUSED_CHANGE
      Indicates a change in the paused value.

      Creates a new SoundPlayerThread with the given source.
